en.title: FE Donates VND 50 Mill (RM 10,000) to Quang Tri Foundation For Disabled and Orphans, Vietnam.
en.content: In line with FE's vision of promoting social entrepreneurship, FE is proud to donate VND 50 Mill (RM 10,000) to Vietnam's Quang Tri Foundation For Disabled and Orphans during FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner in Ho Chi Minh City on 11th July 2009. Accepting the mock cheque on behalf of the Foundation is it's Chairman, prominent politician, Mr Duong Quat.

meta.description: FE Donates VND 50 Mill (RM 10,000) to Quang Tri Foundation For Disabled and Orphans, Vietnam.
